text: innum ivvulakattilum, marumaiyilum enkalukku (alakiya) nanmaikalaiye vitittarulvayaka! Niccayamaka nankal unnaiye munnokkukirom" (enrum pirarttittar). Atarku iraivan, "ennutaiya arulanatu ellap porulkalilum (virintu, parantu) culntu nirkiratu eninum atanai payapaktiyutan (peni) natapporukkum, (muraiyaka) jakattu kotuttu varuvorukkum nam'mutaiya vacanankalai nampukiravarkalukkum nan vitittarul ceyven" enru kurinan
